subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The veteran trainer Nacho Beristain will prepare Oscar De La Hoya for his Dec. 6 fight with Manny Pacquiao, De La Hoya said. He began searching for a new trainer three weeks ago after Floyd Mayweather Sr., his longtime cornerman, agreed to train Ricky Hatton for his Nov. 22 bout with Paulie Malignaggi. Mayweather accepted the job before De La Hoya completed plans for his 147-pound fight at the MGM Grand Garden in Las Vegas.
